import React from 'react' import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' import { minLength, required } from '../utilits/validators/validators' import { Input } from '../FormsControls/FormsControls' import s from './' const minLength5 = minLength(5) const LoginForm = (props) => { return props.isAuth ?
:
"error"
Remember me
} const LoginReduxForm = reduxForm({ form: 'login' })(LoginForm) const Login = (props) => { const onSubmit = (data) => { props.isAuth ? props.logoutThunk() : props.loginThunk(data.login, data.password, data.rememberMe) } return (

Login

) } export default Login
